Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model

Class Chest

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BaseObject
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Chest
public class Chest
extends BaseObject
Structure for chest objects. Each created chest is defined by unique name, short description and image. Chest can hold up to 3 items which can be later obtained by players. Chest is shown in map in JavaFX Circle object.

  • Field Summary
